channel.title: NashvilleStandUp Podcast
channel.description: NashvilleStandUp.com presents.. The NashvilleStandUp Podcast. Stand-up comedians playing standup clips from comedy shows, interviewing comics and being jackasses.
channel.itunes:author: NashvilleStandUp.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: stand-up comedians playing clips from shows, interviewing each other and being jackasses
channel.itunes:summary:
NashvilleStandUp.com presents.. The NashvilleStandUp Podcast. Stand-up comedians playing standup clips from comedy shows, interviewing comics and being jackasses.. now better than ever as an enhanced podcast, uncensored and unrestrained by any sort of unenhanced censoring restrainers.
Visit http://www.NashvilleStandUp.com/radio/ to leave comments about this and our other shows.
Comics! Got a funny cd you want us to play? Send it in! See http://www.NashvilleStandUp.com/radio/ for more details.

item.title: #17 - Return Of The NashvilleStandUp Podcast
item.itunes:author: NashvilleStandUp.com
item.description:
Doug Stanhope; Brett Erickson; Col. Parker; What If They Were Idiots; Retire A Hacky Bit: Wal Mart Greeter Jokes and more with your hosts Jesse Perry and Chad Riden.
The NashvilleStandUp.com Podcast returns better than ever as an enhanced podcast, uncensored and unrestrained by any sort of unenhanced censoring restrainers.
Visit http://www.NashvilleStandUp.com/radio/ to leave comments about this and our other shows.
Comics! Got a funny cd you want us to play? Send it in! See http://www.NashvilleStandUp.com/radio/ for more details.

item.title: #16 - Patton Oswalt and Cesar Cervantes
item.itunes:author: NashvilleStandUp.com
item.description: Patton Oswalt calls in for an interview; Cesar Cervantes stops in to hang out and play some of his stand-up; Also in the studio: Chad Riden, Jesse Perry, Ryan Williams, Rob Haynes, Justin T, Corey Reppond and Chris Loyd.
item.itunes:subtitle: Patton Oswalt calls in for an interview; Cesar Cervantes stops in to hang out and play some of his stand-up; Also in the studio: Chad Riden, Jesse Perry, Ryan Williams, Rob Haynes, Justin T, Corey Reppond and Chris Loyd.
